refnamediv.refpurpose: 作用された行の数を得る

refsect1.title: 説明
refsect1.para: OCIRowCount はupdate文に影響された行の数を返します。 この関数は、select が返す行の数は通知しません!

example.title: OCIRowCount
example.programlisting:
";
    $conn = OCILogon("scott","tiger");
    $stmt = OCIParse($conn,"create table emp2 as select * from emp");

    print OCIRowCount($stmt) . " rows inserted.
";
    OCIFreeStatement($stmt);
    $stmt = OCIParse($conn,"delete from emp2");
    OCIExecute($stmt);
    print OCIRowCount($stmt) . " rows deleted.
";
    OCICommit($conn);
    OCIFreeStatement($stmt);
